L1 Approve/Reject Offer.actorOnQueryCondition: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u.id) FROM c3_offer_and_fitment o, c3_user u, UserRoleGroup ug WHERE o.applicant_id = $jobApplication$ and o.is_latest_fitment = 1 and u.company_id = $company$ and u.status = 1 and u.role = 1 and u.id = ug.user_id and ug.companyId = u.company_id and ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L1 Approver","fieldValue"', o.customFields ) > 0 THEN REPLACE( SUBSTRING( o.customFields, LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L1 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40, LOCATE( '"', o.customFields, LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L1 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40 ) - ( LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L1 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40 ) ), ',', '' ) ELSE '' END ) ) = u.email_id

L2 Approve/Reject Offer.actorOnQueryCondition: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u.id) FROM c3_offer_and_fitment o, c3_user u, UserRoleGroup ug WHERE o.applicant_id = $jobApplication$ and o.is_latest_fitment = 1 and u.company_id = $company$ and u.status = 1 and u.role = 1 and u.id = ug.user_id and ug.companyId = u.company_id and ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L2 Approver","fieldValue"', o.customFields ) > 0 THEN REPLACE( SUBSTRING( o.customFields, LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L2 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40, LOCATE( '"', o.customFields, LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L2 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40 ) - ( LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L2 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40 ) ), ',', '' ) ELSE '' END ) ) = u.email_id

L3 Approve/Reject Offer.actorOnQueryCondition: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u.id) FROM c3_offer_and_fitment o, c3_user u, UserRoleGroup ug WHERE o.applicant_id = $jobApplication$ and o.is_latest_fitment = 1 and u.company_id = $company$ and u.status = 1 and u.role = 1 and u.id = ug.user_id and ug.companyId = u.company_id and ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L3 Approver","fieldValue"', o.customFields ) > 0 THEN REPLACE( SUBSTRING( o.customFields, LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L3 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40, LOCATE( '"', o.customFields, LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L3 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40 ) - ( LOCATE( '"fieldName":"L3 Approver"', o.customFields ) + 40 ) ), ',', '' ) ELSE '' END ) ) = u.email_id

dataSuggestionRule.name: CoforgeSource
dataSuggestionRule.populationQuery: SELECT Distinct new map(u.id as id, u.emailId as emailId) FROM User u, UserRoleGroup ug WHERE u.companyId = $companyId$ and u.id = ug.userId and u.emailId IN ('ashish_jain4@yopmail.com','varun_gautam@yopmail.com','amogh_balakrishnan@yopmail.com') and u.status = 1

DataToAdd.queryToGetData: SELECT ja.source FROM c3_job_application ja WHERE ja.id =$applyId$

queryConditions.condition: select if((ofc.fieldValue = 'US-C2C') or(ofc.fieldValue = 'India-SubCon') or(ofc.fieldValue = 'Canada-C2C'),if(ja.source = 'Partner',1,0),1) as result from c3_offernfitment_custom ofc join c3_job_application ja on ofc.applicantId = ja.id where ofc.fieldName = 'salaryStructure' and ofc.applicantId = $applyId$ limit 1
queryConditions.errorMessage: Please change the source to the respective vendor to perform this action

queryConditions.condition: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 AS result FROM c3_job as j WHERE j.status != 0 AND j.id IN ( select ja.job_id FROM c3_job_application AS ja WHERE ja.id = $applyId$ )
queryConditions.errorMessage: Fitment can not be initiated as this indent is closed

queryConditions.condition: select count(ja.id)>0 as result,from c3_job_application ja where ja.source = 'Partner' and ja.job_id != '-1' and ja.is_active = 1 and ja.id = $applyId$
queryConditions.errorMessage: Please change the source to the respective vendor to perform this action

Shortlist to Another Job.displayOnQuery: Select j.jobTitle as jobTitle,j.newJobCode as newJobCode,j.jobCode as jobCode,j.id as id ,j.location as location from Job j WHERE companyId = $companyId$ AND workflowName = 'WORKFLOW_DRLNAG' AND status !=0

queryConditions.condition: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 AS result FROM c3_job as j WHERE j.status != 0 AND j.id IN ( select ja.job_id FROM c3_job_application AS ja WHERE ja.id = $applyId$ )
queryConditions.errorMessage: Fitment can not be initiated as this indent is closed

queryConditions.condition: select if ((SELECT ( ( SELECT COUNT(*) from c3_job_application WHERE job_id = (select job_id from c3_job_application WHERE id=$applyId$) AND current_status = 'Joined' AND is_active = 1 ) - ( SELECT positions_req FROM c3_job WHERE id = (select job_id from c3_job_application WHERE id=$applyId$) ) ) AS count)<0,1,0) as result
queryConditions.errorMessage: Cannot mark the candidate as Joined, as this Indent is already fulfilled.

queryConditions.condition: SELECT (SELECT ( (SELECT COUNT(*) from c3_job_application WHERE job_id=(select job_id from c3_job_application WHERE id=$applyId$) AND current_status='Joined' AND is_active=1) - (SELECT positions_req FROM c3_job WHERE id=(select job_id from c3_job_application WHERE id=$applyId$)) ) AS count)=-1 AS result

Move to Another Workflow.displayOnQuery: Select j.jobTitle as jobTitle,j.newJobCode as newJobCode,j.jobCode as jobCode,j.id as id, j.location  as location from Job j WHERE j.companyId = $companyId$ AND j.workflowName = 'WORKFLOW_PERSISTENT' AND (j.status = 1 or j.status =2)

dataSuggestionRule.name: MindtreeTAMSuggestion
dataSuggestionRule.populationQuery: SELECT distinct new map(u.id as id, u.emailId as emailId) FROM User u, JobApplication ja, Job j, UserRoleGroup ug WHERE ja.id = $applyId$ and ja.jobId = j.id and ja.companyId = u.companyId and u.id = ug.userId and ((j.deptFullCode = ug.deptFullCode and ug.roleCode = 'C2HApprover') OR (ug.roleCode = 'C2HApprover')) and u.status = 1

DataToAdd.queryToGetData: SELECT j.job_code FROM c3_job j, c3_job_application ja WHERE ja.id =$applyId$ AND ja.job_id = j.id

dataSuggestionRule.name: TechnicalScreenerSuggestion
dataSuggestionRule.populationQuery: Select Distinct new map(u.id as id, u.emailId as emailId) from User u where u.companyId = $companyId$ and u.status = 1 and u.roleId = 1

queryConditions.condition: select distinct j.positions_req - count(ja.id) > 0 as result from c3_job as j join c3_job_application as ja on j.id=ja.job_id where j.id = (select job_id from c3_job_application where id = $applyId$) and ja.current_status IN ('Joined','To be Hired') AND ja.is_active=1
queryConditions.errorMessage: Please increase number of positions in Taleo or shortlist to another job in Ptalent

queryConditions.condition: SELECT count(*)>0 as result FROM c3_offer_and_fitment onf, c3_job_application ja WHERE (SELECT REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(onf.customfields,REPLACE(REPLACE(Json_search(onf.customfields,'one', 'approvalselector'),'"',''),'fieldVariableName','fieldValue')),'"','')) = 1 AND ja.company_id = $companyId$ AND ja.id= $applyId$ and ja.id=onf.applicant_id AND onf.is_latest_fitment = 1

SELECT count(*)>0 as result FROM c3_offer_and_fitment onf, c3_job_application ja WHERE (SELECT REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(onf.customfields,REPLACE(REPLACE(Json_search(onf.customfields,'one', 'approvalselector'),'"',''),'fieldVariableName','fieldValue')),'"','')) = 2 AND ja.company_id = $companyId$ AND ja.id= $applyId$ and ja.id=onf.applicant_id AND onf.is_latest_fitment = 1

SELECT count(*)>0 as result FROM c3_offer_and_fitment onf, c3_job_application ja WHERE (SELECT REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(onf.customfields,REPLACE(REPLACE(Json_search(onf.customfields,'one', 'approvalselector'),'"',''),'fieldVariableName','fieldValue')),'"','')) = 3 AND ja.company_id = $companyId$ AND ja.id= $applyId$ and ja.id=onf.applicant_id AND onf.is_latest_fitment = 1

SELECT count(*)>0 as result FROM c3_offer_and_fitment onf, c3_job_application ja WHERE (SELECT REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(onf.customfields,REPLACE(REPLACE(Json_search(onf.customfields,'one', 'approvalselector'),'"',''),'fieldVariableName','fieldValue')),'"','')) = 0 AND ja.company_id = $companyId$ AND ja.id= $applyId$ and ja.id=onf.applicant_id AND onf.is_latest_fitment = 1

select if(ja.source = 'Partner',1,0) as result from c3_offer_and_fitment offit join c3_job_application ja on offit.applicant_id = ja.id where offit.applicant_id = $applyId$ and offit.isFinalRecord = 1 and (CASE WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure","fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45, LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure", "fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45,LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) ELSE '' END) = ('India-SubCon') order by offit.lastUpdatedTime desc limit 1

select if(ja.source = 'Partner',1,0) as result from c3_offer_and_fitment offit join c3_job_application ja on offit.applicant_id = ja.id where offit.applicant_id = $applyId$ and offit.isFinalRecord = 1 and (CASE WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure","fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45, LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure", "fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45,LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) ELSE '' END) = ('US-C2C' or 'Canada-C2C') order by offit.lastUpdatedTime desc limit 1

SELECT count(*)>0 as result FROM c3_offer_and_fitment onf, c3_job_application ja WHERE (SELECT REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(onf.customfields,REPLACE(REPLACE(Json_search(onf.customfields,'one', 'approvalselector'),'"',''),'fieldVariableName','fieldValue')),'"','')) = 4 AND ja.company_id = $companyId$ AND ja.id= $applyId$ and ja.id=onf.applicant_id AND onf.is_latest_fitment = 1

select count(offit.id>0) as result from c3_offer_and_fitment offit where offit.applicant_id = $applyId$ and offit.isFinalRecord = 1 and (CASE WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure","fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45, LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure", "fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45,LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) ELSE '' END) != ('US-C2C' or 'India-SubCon'or 'Canada-C2C') order by offit.lastUpdatedTime desc limit 1

SELECT count(*)>0 as result FROM c3_offer_and_fitment onf, c3_job_application ja WHERE (SELECT REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(onf.customfields,REPLACE(REPLACE(Json_search(onf.customfields,'one', 'approvalselector'),'"',''),'fieldVariableName','fieldValue')),'"','')) > 2 AND ja.company_id = $companyId$ AND ja.id= $applyId$ and ja.id=onf.applicant_id AND onf.is_latest_fitment = 1

select count(offit.id>0) as result from c3_offer_and_fitment offit where offit.applicant_id = $applyId$ and offit.isFinalRecord = 1 and (CASE WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure","fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45, LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName":"Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) WHEN LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure", "fieldValue"', offit.customFields) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45,LOCATE('"', offit.customFields, LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45) - (LOCATE('"fieldName": "Salary Structure"', offit.customFields) + 45)) ELSE '' END) != ('US-C2C' or 'India-SubCon'or 'Canada-C2C') order by offit.lastUpdatedTime desc limit 1
